forum.content:
Hey Guys(Girls) ~ what's up !?

Recently I want to practice WRITING LETTERS WITH FOUNTAIN PANs .

But it's boring writing things without purposes .
I decide to write things down and mail it to someone(YES, mail by Post ) . It might be fun to look forward to your reply.

Is there anyone who would like to join with ?
Hopefully you are good in handwriting !

中文馬欸通喔！阿哈哈哈哈！
Text me ~
forum.title: Pen Pal Wanted
